title: Martyrs’ sacrifices to lead to Kashmir’s independence: Amir Muqam
content:
ISLAMABAD, Nov 6 (APP):Federal Minister for Kashmir and Gilgit-Baltistan Affairs, Engineer Amir Muqam, on Wednesday reaffirmed Pakistan’s commitment to Kashmir’s freedom, pledging that the sacrifices of Kashmiri martyrs will not be in vain and expressed confidence that Kashmiris will ultimately win independence from India.
In his message on Jammu Martyrs’ Day, the minister praised the unparalleled sacrifices of Kashmiris, stating that the martyrs hold a significant place in Kashmir’s struggle for freedom. The sacrifices of Jammu’s martyrs, driven by their love for Pakistan, will be eternally remembered.
He commended the martyrs’ contribution to the freedom movement, remembering how Indian forces, in collaboration with Dogra and RSS, martyred 300,000 Kashmiris.
